statements: SELECT username, email FROM profile WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM profile WHERE height > 5.5;
SELECT username, age FROM profile WHERE weight < 70;
SELECT user_id, email, weight FROM profile WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM profile ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM profile WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM profile WHERE weight < 70 OR height > 170 ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT user_id, email, age FROM profile WHERE age >= 25 AND age <= 40 ORDER BY user_id LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM profile WHERE age IN (25, 30, 35) AND weight BETWEEN 60 AND 80 ORDER BY weight DESC, username ASC;
SELECT username, age, height FROM profile WHERE username LIKE '%john%' OR username LIKE '%jane%' ORDER BY age ASC, height DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, gender, height, weight FROM user_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT username, email, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT * FROM achievements WHERE points > 50 ORDER BY points DESC, date_completed ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male' AND height > 170 ORDER BY height ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, age FROM user_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM achievements WHERE points >= 100 ORDER BY date_completed DESC, achievement_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, age, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE weight < 70 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT user_id, username, birthdate FROM user_profiles WHERE birthdate >= '1990-01-01' ORDER BY birthdate DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, height, weight FROM user_profiles WHERE height > 170 AND weight < 70;
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, l.total_points, l.rank FROM user_profiles u JOIN leaderboard l ON u.user_id = l.user_id ORDER BY l.total_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY height DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE birthdate < '1990-01-01';
SELECT u.username, a.achievement_name FROM user_profiles u JOIN achievements a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.date_achieved > '2020-01-01';
SELECT u.username, l.total_points FROM user_profiles u JOIN leaderboard l ON u.user_id = l.user_id WHERE l.rank < 100 ORDER BY l.total_points DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT u.username, u.height, u.weight, a.achievement_name FROM user_profiles u LEFT JOIN achievements a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.achievement_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY u.height ASC, a.date_achieved DESC;
SELECT username, age FROM user_profiles WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT * FROM achievements ORDER BY achieved_date DESC;
SELECT username, height, weight FROM user_profiles WHERE height > 160 AND weight < 70;
SELECT user_id, achievement_name FROM achievements WHERE achievement_id < 5;
SELECT user_id, rank FROM leaderboard ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, age, weight FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT achievement_name, achieved_date FROM achievements WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY achieved_date DESC;
SELECT username, height, weight FROM user_profiles WHERE height > 170 AND weight < 70;
SELECT position, score, rank FROM leaderboard WHERE score > 1000 ORDER BY rank ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, email, gender FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, email, age FROM users WHERE gender = 'male';
SELECT * FROM achievements ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_achievements FROM achievements GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email, age FROM users WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT u.username, a.achievement_name, a.achievement_date FROM users u JOIN achievements a ON u.user_id = a.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_workouts FROM workouts GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_workouts DESC;

SELECT c.challenge_id, ch.username as challenger, ce.username as challengee, c.challenge_date FROM challenges c JOIN users ch ON c.challenger_id = ch.user_id JOIN users ce ON c.challengee_id = ce.user_id WHERE c.challenge_status = 'pending';
